name: CarFormer
description:
Welcome to CARFORMER, a platformer game with cars. Use the left and right arrows  to move, and you're so heavy (being a car) that you can't jump unless you are on a spring.

An evil car factory has taken over the world, and you (the only car that survived) must defeat all the evil cars and restore peace to the automobiles!

Thank you for supporting CARFORMER.
